RTCIceCandidateComponent.summary:
The read-only component property
on the interface is a string which indicates whether
the candidate is an RTP or
an RTCP candidate.

remarks.para:
If a candidate represents both RTP and RTCP multiplexed together, it is reported as an
RTP candidate.

RTCIceCandidateComponent.value: A string which is one of the following:
